players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Bob is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.

Bob: "I support Alice and Diana's suggestion to observe everyone's behavior carefully during this discussion round. Let's work together as a team to ensure the safety of our village."

You: "I believe that we should all try to remain calm and not accuse anyone without solid evidence during this discussion round. Let's focus on gathering more information before making any decisions."

Diana: "Based on the information we have gathered during Day 1, I suggest that we keep a close eye on Bob's behavior. He seemed quite defensive and evasive during our discussion yesterday. Let us not forget that mafia members often try to hide their true intentions."

Bob: "I understand Diana's concerns and I assure you all that my defensive behavior during the last discussion round was due to my role as the detective. I am committed to ensuring the safety of our village and will continue to work closely with all of you to uncover any suspicious activity."
